title: Burn
description: A woman must choose to leave her old life behind…Logan, the biker who swirled into my life like a tornado, leaving me devastated and confused. Flustered and in love. But, how could I love a tornado?Now, we're stranded in the middle of Arizona. No water, no food, nothing but sunlight and heat for miles in every direction. Logan's called in help to pick us up, but who can we trust anymore? After everything we've gone through, I'm scared the only person I can trust is Logan. He's a criminal… and outlaw… and because of him, so am I.A man's will to save everyone might just burn it all down…Everything is screwed up. Surge is strange and acting distant, and I don't know who to trust anymore. My bike's left in the middle of nowhere, and I have no idea what's happened in the States while Cassie and I were gone. If things have heated up between the Skeletons MC and the Ruin Outlaws MC, we could be in serious trouble. But first… I have to confront Surge… and decide if I can trust him anymore. If I can't, I might have to just take over or destroy it all.The Final Chapter of Amy Isan's Ruin Outlaws MC series!THE COMPLETE RUIN OUTLAWS MC:#1 Bomb#2 Spark#3 Iron#4 Flame#5 Burn
author: Amy Isan
